about_the_game:
Journey through a twisted dreamscape

After waking up in a room, you find yourself in the strange world of Eclipsium. How did you get here? What's your mission? As you lay eyes on an eerie tower looming in the distance, you hope it contains the answers to your questions.

Overcome uncanny obstacles

Along your journey, you'll face obstacles trying to hinder your progress. While they start off inconspicuous, they steadily become more disturbing. As each area of the game presents you with new challenges, you'll need to use your wits to prevail. The game features a multitude of obstacles, all self-contained and serving as a means to further immerse you in the world and atmosphere of Eclipsium.

Barren lands, yet breathing

The world of Eclipsium acts as more than just a backdrop. Even though it seems void of life, the environment says otherwise. The ever-present motion, endlessly respiring. Proving to be more than just a figment of your imagination, the world messes with you in various ways. Seemingly inconsequential at first, it gradually descends into an unnerving symphony of disruptions.

Experience the environments of Eclipsium

Eclipsium is filled with things to explore and experience, such as but not limited to:

  • Explore over a dozen vivid and surreal environments

  • Multiple carefully crafted full-motion video cutscenes

  • A deep and oppressive atmosphere throughout the experience

  • Painstakingly created hand animations

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains non-realistic depictions of blood and bodies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: A trippy and retro-inspired horror game that will take you on a journey through surreal lands. Delve deeper and deeper into the unorthodox. Lose track of your sense of space and time in this immersive and non-euclidean experience. See what's waiting for you beyond the tower.
